Name: SQL - Execute Scripts Ordered
Description: Given a path to a folder containing SQL scripts, this module will execute each script on the database server and catalog provided.  It will execute them in order based on their name.

Parameters.Name: ConnectionString
Parameters.Label: Connection String

Parameters.Name: ContinueOnError
Parameters.Label: Continue On Error
Parameters.HelpText: If set to true, an error with the SQL statement will simply write to the log and not cause an error in the deployment.

Parameters.Name: CommandTimeout
Parameters.Label: Individual Go Timeout
Parameters.HelpText:
Each individual go statements timeout value in seconds.

A value of 0 indicates no limit (an attempt to execute a command will wait indefinitely).

Parameters.Name: PathToScripts
Parameters.Label: Path to Script Files
Parameters.HelpText: The path to the SQL script files you wish to execute.

Parameters.Name: VersionRegEx
Parameters.Label: Filename Version Reg Ex
Parameters.HelpText: The regular expression to extract major and minor version number from file name.  Given Release2_61.sql, use "Release(\d+)\_(\d+)\\.".
